short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For those of us who don't want to get derailed by glancing at every single avi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension does one thing and one thing only: blurs out user avi's on the web version of twitter. Resist the urge to peep random profiles simply because of the avatars they've used.
